about_the_game:
Caution:

This game requires substantial CPU processing for 3D animation. We highly recommend testing the trial version to ensure compatibility before purchase. Note: This product may not perform optimally on older Windows 10 PCs that do not meet Windows 11 update requirements.

Overview:

Step into the rich world of Nomadic Tale (Harvest Elysium) and immerse yourself in a journey of harvests and adventures! As a seasonal worker and backpacker, you’ll explore diverse lands across the seasons, working in orchards and mines, meeting unique heroines, and unfolding close-knit, engaging stories. In maze-like fields, collect fruits and tackle unique challenges, advancing to new seasons filled with exciting, untold journeys and unforgettable encounters.

Features:

★ Charming and memorable character designs with detailed animations

★ Beginner-friendly gameplay that’s easy to pick up and enjoy

★ Supports both English and Simplified Chinese

★ Full access—no extra charges; experience all content with this package

★ Seasonal changes and evolving storylines that unfold through unique heroines

Seasonal Harvests and Adventures

Each season brings a different theme—apple picking, grape harvesting, mushroom foraging, and coal mining. Accept tasks from local farmers and fulfill missions that challenge you to gather resources specific to each environment. As you complete these tasks, each season unfolds with fresh discoveries and new thrills.

Strategic and Engaging 3D Action

Across beautifully animated 3D stages, you’ll use a top-down camera view to collect items strategically. With limited inventory and challenging paths to navigate, you’ll need to plan wisely to reach new harvesting areas and adventures. The maze-like maps provide both a challenge and opportunity for efficient resource gathering.

Memorable Stories with Heroines

Each season introduces heroines with unique backstories, offering the chance to build close relationships and experience special storylines. With each choice, the story and your relationships will change, putting the progression of each bond in your hands.

Resource Management and Evening Survival

After a day’s work, dining at restaurants and resting in inns are essential. With limited funds, selling your harvest and carefully managing resources are crucial for preparing for the next day. In the evenings, character events unfold, deepening the story and enriching your adventure.

Seasonal Adventure Awaits!

Nomadic Tale (Harvest Elysium) is set to release between fall and winter of 2024. Join the journey, dive into seasonal adventures, and experience dramatic stories with heroines who’ll make each season unforgettable.

short_description: Nomadic Tale is a 3D action-adventure game where you play as a backpacker working in orchards and mines. Explore maze-like fields, gather resources, and complete seasonal missions. Meet unique heroines each season, deepening your story. Enjoy nighttime events filled with romance and adventure!
